short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your real-time earnings during work hours with customizable hourly rates and scheduled tracking periods.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay motivated and track your earnings in real time! Salary Tracker is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to help you stay focused by calculating how much you’ve earned during your working hours. Simply input your hourly rate and start time, and watch your progress grow as you work. Perfect for freelancers, remote workers, and anyone looking for a daily productivity boost!

Key Features:
	•	Enter your hourly rate and currency.
	•	Real-time earnings calculation while you work.
	•	Simple and clean interface for easy tracking.
	•	Lightweight and seamlessly integrates into your workflow.

Take control of your productivity and turn your working hours into motivation with Salary Tracker!


My first ever extension :)
